subject: Re: Fwd: WTG Website update
preview: Thanks Heath  Looks good - they can't miss it now 😊  Have a Happy Easter.  Jo

full_threads.body:
Thanks Heath

Looks good - they can't miss it now 😊

Have a Happy Easter.

Jo

Hi Jo, 

Yes sure, the sports menu item is now back. 

We have made the registration button more prominent by using the yellow colour. It helps it to pop on the page. 

We have also added the button to the header on desktop and in the footer in mobile as a 'sticky' button. I think this will help to make sure it's seen. 

Let me know your thoughts?

Me again!

Can you please check the sports pages, they seem to have disappeared altogether. They should appear under the Participate section.

Thanks

Thanks Heath
  • Have you got a way to the Register button more prominent on that page. I found it worked OK on mobile but not easily found on the desktop.
  • Yes, please can you add it to the homepage as well. Again it needs to be prominent. As a suggestion …. - we could replace the copy "The countdown has begun!" with "Registrations now open" . Then add the Register button between the body text and the days remaining counter?
Thank you Jo

Hi Jo, 

Yes sure, we have added made the new sports pages live and added the registration button here:
https://worldtransplantgames.org/participate/registration/

Please let me know if you would like the button added anywhere else as well?

Hello Heath, As discussed, please could you:
  • Replace the Sports page with the Sports 2 page and publish live today
  • Publish the individual sports pages live today
  • Prepare the registration button and link to go live today. Please can you send Matty and I a preview of this?
This is the link: https://www.gmsportal.net/Live/Login.aspx?ESID=35 Any queries, please let know. Kind regards Jo Jo O'Farrell Communications & Event Manager - World Transplant Games 2023 Transplant Australia Ltd P: 0417 286 486 http://www.transplant.org.au/ jo.ofarrell@transplant.org.au

Hi Jo, 

Yes, this will be fine to action on Thursday. Once you have the Registration link, we can add a prominent button and live the pages etc. 

Standing by!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath, I hope you had a good weekend. We are close to launching the individual sports pages and registration. The registration officially goes live on Friday this week, but given that it is Good Friday …. we would like to do this quietly on Thursday with your help. So firstly, I am hoping you will be here this week and haven't already gone fishin' ! Secondly, please can you do the following in preparation.
  • Prepare a prominent "REGISTER" Button for this page https://worldtransplantgames.org/participate/registration/ that links to an external webpage I haven't yet been provided with…
On Thursday, we'll need to
  • Replace the Sports page with the Sports 2 page and publish
  • Publish the individual sports pages
  • Publish the registration button and link
  • There are some other smaller copy changes but hopefully we can manage that ourselves.
Many thanks Jo
Logged 5mins to Harvest

Hi Jo, 

Yes sure, confirming we have updated this for you.

https://worldtransplantgames.org/sports/5km-run/ please check. heath, thanks

madam @rica 5mins

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

Thanks for uploading those images.

Please can we make a change to 5KM Run page - please replace it with the image attached if possible - I think its already on the website under Sports.

If that image doesn't work, let me know and I will find another.

Thanks very much

Jo
Logged 20mins to Harvest

20mins madam @rica 

https://worldtransplantgames.org/the-sports-2/

@glen can you please download the images from the dropbox folder and run through Photoshop to save for web. Dimensions to be 2000x1000px please. You can then add them as the featured images for each of the sports pages you created as the new post type. They should show up as the hero background image please.

Hello Heath

For the images for each sport, please re-use the images on this page https://worldtransplantgames.org/participate/the-sports/

For:

Athletics

Swimming

Cycling

5km Run

Then for the other sports I hope these might work. Had to resort to unsplash.

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/y1lr44ltiw011ck/AAB1dX5Z7OaP---CxRD68GkGa?dl=0

Badminton

Basketball

Darts

Golf

Lawn Bowls

Petanque

6 a side football

Table Tennis

Tennis

Ten Pin Bowling

Volleyball

Let me know if you have any queries.

Many thanks

Jo

Hi Jo, 

You are very welcome! 

Yes, please supply us the images and we will load them in... This way we can adjust the image sizing etc. to best suit the design.

Hi Heath

Thanks very much - I love your explainers on loom!

We will also want to change the images for each sport - currently all have a picture of a swimmer. Is this something better left for you to do? In which case , I can prepare a folder with some suggested images? Otherwise if it's easier for us to do then perhaps you could send another loom.

I am preparing some additional web updates to send you on Monday.

Many thanks

Jo

Jo O'Farrell

Communications & Event Manager - World Transplant Games 2023

Transplant Australia Ltd

P: 0417 286 486

http://www.transplant.org.au/

jo.ofarrell@transplant.org.au

Hi Jo, 

We now have the sports section ready for you to populate. 

Here is a quick how to video: https://www.loom.com/share/0dfd9cc4807848d6ac11ce8e56706ebf

Please let me know if you would like any changes, or have any questions.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia changed the customer to Jo O'Farrell
